topic.title: Firewall Settings
topic.shortdesc: Cloudera suggests that all firewall software on and between nodes in the cluster be disabled.

ol.li: Check the firewall status by runing the following commands:/sbin/chkconfig --list iptables /sbin/chkconfig --list ip6tables
Disable the firewall by runing the following commands:/sbin/chkconfig iptables off /sbin/chkconfig ip6tables off
